StringTable.Label: NaturalWonder_Name
StringTable.String: Natural Wonder

StringTable.Label: NaturalWonder_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Attractions built here will draw tourists from the furthest reaches of the galaxy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AncientRuins_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Ruins

StringTable.Label: AncientRuins_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These Precursor ruins are a great site for researching their exotic technologies.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GeothermalSprings_Name
StringTable.String: Geothermal Springs

StringTable.Label: GeothermalSprings_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These springs power manufacturing plants, and heated pools.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Cataract_Name
StringTable.String: Cataract

StringTable.Label: Cataract_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Massive falls provide almost free energy, for manufacturing or research.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Planetfall_Name
StringTable.String: Planetfall

StringTable.Label: Planetfall_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The reported location of the original scouts to set foot on this world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AncientWonder_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Wonder

StringTable.Label: AncientWonder_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The fame of this ancient wonder can spread your influence and attract tourists.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PreciousMetals_Name
StringTable.String: Precious Metals

StringTable.Label: PreciousMetals_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Veins of precious metals make this an ideal spot to make some profit.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RareStones_Name
StringTable.String: Rare Stones

StringTable.Label: RareStones_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Rare gems found in this location are valuable throughout the galaxy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MineralRich_Name
StringTable.String: Mineral Rich

StringTable.Label: MineralRich_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The minerals found here are extremely useful for starship construction.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RareEarth_Name
StringTable.String: Rare Earth Metals

StringTable.Label: RareEarth_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Rare earth metals allow for much more exotic research methods.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Floodplain_Name
StringTable.String: Floodplain

StringTable.Label: Floodplain_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Locally available food supports larger city sizes.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: WildGrain_Name
StringTable.String: Wild Grain

StringTable.Label: WildGrain_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Locally available food supports larger city sizes.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Wasteland_Name
StringTable.String: Wasteland

StringTable.Label: Wasteland_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This desolate area is barely usable and perfect for blowing things up.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Caverns_Name
StringTable.String: Caverns

StringTable.Label: Caverns_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Deep natural caverns, perfect for fortification against just about any type of attack.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Haven_Name
StringTable.String: Haven

StringTable.Label: Haven_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This idyllic region is so beautiful that living here makes people happy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Paradise_Name
StringTable.String: Paradise

StringTable.Label: Paradise_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This slice of paradise is where everyone wants to live, or at least visit once in their life.[/COLOR]
